title: Death Stranding Arrives November 8th - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.29.19
description:
Use code KFGAMES for 74% off Omaha Steaks Father’s Day Steak Fix Gift Offer at http://omahasteaks.com

The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily4 to start your trial now. 

It's a jam-packed Whitta Wednesday as Gary and Greg talk Death Stranding, Pokemon, and EA's non-E3 plan.

00:05:56 - Housekeeping
Nick Names and Oreo on patreon.com/kindafunny for $1!

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:48 - Death Stranding Release Date
00:13:50 Best Friend Q. - Does a November release date make sense for death stranding? - BillyThedoor

00:29:20 -  Pokemon Wrap-Up, via IGN and GameSpot
00:39:02 Best Friend Q. - I am just confused as to why this conference garnered so much ridicule. Is it because it was a streamed conference, so people expected bigger announcements? Is it because of some of the awkward presentation moments? Or am I missing something else? - Alec (from Minnesota)
